author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Gujarat police on Thursday filed another FIR against Hardik Patel after a mobile phone charger and battery were recovered from his possession in Surat jail. The Patel agitation leader is already facing trial in a number of cases, including two sedition cases.

According to the police, they recovered the mobile charger, battery and a letter on Wednesday when Hardik was being escorted out to be produced in court. The 22-year-old has been charged under Section 188 of the IPC (disobedience to order duly promulgated by public servant), as well as Sections 43, 44 and 45 (12) of the Prison Act for receiving, bringing or removing prohibited articles in prison cells.

Recently, police had recovered a mobile phone outside the barrack in Surat jail.
title: Another FIR registered against Hardik
